p: Interaction of cultivar and levels of NPK was significant ( p ≤ 0.01) for both protein and oil content ( Table 6). The protein content was significantly higher in grains of P 3396 fertilized with 125% RDF, while the grain oil content of P 3522 was significantly higher when the crop received 50% RDF. The linear regression study ( Fig 1) indicates the inverse relationship (r = -0.285, p ≤ 0.01) between grain protein and oil content of the tested hybrids.
